Package it.uninsubria.server.cache

Class HybridCacheManager

java.lang.Object
it.uninsubria.server.cache.HybridCacheManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
DistributedCacheManager
public class HybridCacheManager extends Object
Hybrid Cache Manager: In-memory + Disk Persistence Combines fast in-memory access with disk persistence for large datasets
